title: Haunted Carnival Adventure #47
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Abandoned Ticket Booth
rooms.description: A decrepit ticket booth stands at the entrance to the abandoned carnival. Faded posters peel from the walls, advertising acts from decades past. The wooden counter is covered in dust and cobwebs. Rusted carnival tokens litter the floor. Through the grimy windows, you can see the dark silhouettes of rides against the night sky. The air smells of mildew and old popcorn.

items.name: dusty ticket counter
items.description: An old wooden counter with a cash register and scattered papers

items.name: tarnished brass key
items.description: A small brass key with a clown face engraved on it

items.name: rusted filing cabinet
items.description: A metal cabinet with three drawers, covered in rust and carnival stickers

items.name: faded carnival poster
items.description: A weathered poster advertising the carnival's grand opening
items.text: GRAND OPENING 1923! Mephisto's Magnificent Carnival of Wonders! Owner and Ringmaster: The Great Mephisto. Featuring death-defying acts, mysterious attractions, and the world-famous Funhouse Mirror Maze! Final performances held in the Grand Tent under the big top!

items.name: heavy iron key
items.description: A large iron key with 'FUNHOUSE' stamped on it

items.name: locked ticket box
items.description: A metal box with a brass lock, used for storing ticket money

items.name: ticket seller's journal
items.description: A worn journal belonging to a former carnival employee
items.text: Last Entry: Something terrible happened at the final show in the Grand Tent. The Great Mephisto vanished during his act, and the carnival was abandoned overnight. They say his spirit still haunts the grounds. The only way out is through the Ringmaster's private tent, but you'll need to prove you belong here.

items.name: antique cash register
items.description: A dusty cash register with carnival tokens scattered around it

items.name: brass carnival token
items.description: A token stamped with 'Mephisto's Carnival - 1923'

items.name: funhouse entrance gate
items.description: A creaking metal gate leading to the Funhouse Mirror Maze, secured with a heavy lock

rooms.name: Funhouse Mirror Maze
rooms.description: A disorienting maze of distorted mirrors reflecting endless versions of yourself. Some mirrors are cracked, others clouded with age. Painted clown faces leer from the walls between mirrors. The floor tilts at odd angles, making it hard to keep your balance. Carnival music plays faintly from hidden speakers, the melody warped and unsettling.

items.name: central pedestal
items.description: A round pedestal in the maze's center with a locked compartment

items.name: ornate silver key
items.description: A decorative silver key with a star pattern

items.name: large cracked mirror
items.description: A tall mirror with a spiderweb of cracks across its surface

items.name: crumpled note
items.description: A note stuffed behind the cracked mirror
items.text: I was a performer here, one of Mephisto's acts. The final show was in the Grand Tent - that's where everything went wrong. If you want to escape, you need to reach the Ringmaster's private tent. Only carnival performers can enter. The combination to the pedestal is the year this cursed place opened.

items.name: performer's prop trunk
items.description: A large trunk filled with old carnival props and costumes

items.name: carnival performer costume
items.description: A sequined costume worn by carnival performers

items.name: Mephisto's diary
items.description: The personal diary of the carnival's owner and ringmaster
items.text: I am The Great Mephisto, owner and ringmaster of this magnificent carnival. Tonight is our final performance in the Grand Tent. I've prepared something special - a trick that will astound them all. But I fear I may have delved too deep into the dark arts. If something goes wrong, only a true performer of this carnival will be able to leave through my private tent.

items.name: painted clown face
items.description: A disturbing clown face painted on the wall, its eyes seem to follow you
items.text: Beneath the clown's grin, someone has scratched: 'Mephisto owned us all. The Grand Tent was our stage. We were his performers, bound to this place forever.'

items.name: carnival information board
items.description: A board with faded maps and schedules
items.text: CARNIVAL MAP: Ticket Booth (Entrance), Funhouse Mirror Maze, Game Booths, Rides, Grand Tent (Main Stage), Ringmaster's Private Tent (Staff Only). All final performances held in the Grand Tent under the big top!

items.name: entrance to ringmaster's tent
items.description: A velvet curtain leading to Mephisto's private tent. A brass plaque displays three questions that must be answered.

password_questions.question: Who owned this carnival?
password_questions.hint: Check the carnival poster and Mephisto's diary

password_questions.question: Where was the final show held?
password_questions.hint: Multiple sources mention where the final performance took place

password_questions.question: What are you?
password_questions.hint: The diary and notes explain who can enter the ringmaster's tent

rooms.name: Ringmaster's Private Tent
rooms.description: You've reached Mephisto's private sanctuary! A luxurious tent with red velvet walls and golden tassels. The ringmaster's desk sits in the center, covered with mysterious artifacts and spell books. Through an open flap at the back, you can see the exit - a path leading away from the carnival grounds into the safety of the night. Fresh air flows in, dispelling the oppressive atmosphere.

items.name: ornate ringmaster's desk
items.description: An elaborate desk covered with mystical objects and papers

items.name: ancient spell books
items.description: Leather-bound books filled with arcane symbols and rituals

items.name: Mephisto's top hat
items.description: The Great Mephisto's signature black top hat with a red band

items.name: exit path
items.description: A clear path leading away from the carnival to freedom

rooms.win_message: You've escaped the Haunted Carnival! As you step through the tent flap and onto the path leading away, you hear the faint sound of applause and carnival music fading behind you. The spirits of Mephisto's carnival acknowledge your success. You've solved the mysteries and earned your freedom. You win!
